languages.text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} reinflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect of the same type already on a target, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Until the end of combat, re-applying DoT effects no longer increases their damage by (Medicae/15).

Until the end of combat, whenever the Executioner re-applies a damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} with an effect of the same type on a target, Forced Repentance no longer increases the level of this effect.

Until the end of combat, whenever the Executioner re-applies a damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} with an effect of the same type on a target, Forced Repentance no longer increases the level of this effect.

Until the end of combat, whenever the Executioner reinflicts a damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} of the same type already on a target, Forced Repentance no longer increases the level of this effect.

Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} reinflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect of the same type already on a target, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of this effect.

languages.text: Hasta el final del combate, cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} vuelva a infligir un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado de un tipo que ya tenga el enemigo, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Arrepentimiento forzoso{/g} deja de aumentar el nivel de ese efecto.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} reinflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect of the same type already on a target, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Hasta el final del combate, cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} vuelva a infligir un efecto de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado de un tipo que ya tenga el enemigo, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Arrepentimiento forzoso{/g} deja de aumentar el nivel de ese efecto.

languages.text: 戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}がターゲットがすでに受けている同じタイプの継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を再度与えるたび、{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}でこの効果のレベルが増加しなくなる。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} reinflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect of the same type already on a target, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of this effect.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘が終了するまで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}がターゲットがすでに受けている同じタイプの継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を再度与えるたび、{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}リペンタンスの強制{/g}でこの効果のレベルが増加しなくなる。

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}再次对目标施加已有的持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果时，{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}强迫悔改{/g}层数将不再提高，此效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} reinflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect of the same type already on a target, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of this effect.

traits.locale_text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}再次对目标施加已有的持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果时，{g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}强迫悔改{/g}层数将不再提高，此效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: Bewirkt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekt, mit dem das Ziel bereits belegt ist, noch einmal, erhöht {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Erzwungene Reue{/g} die Stufe dieses Effektes nicht mehr.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} reinflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect of the same type already on a target, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Bewirkt der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g} bis zum Ende des Kampfes einen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekt, mit dem das Ziel bereits belegt ist, noch einmal, erhöht {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Erzwungene Reue{/g} die Stufe dieses Effektes nicht mehr.

languages.text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, lorsque l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} inflige de nouveau un même effet de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs à une cible, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g} n'augmente pas davantage le niveau de cet effet.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} reinflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect of the same type already on a target, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of this effect.

traits.locale_text: Jusqu'à la fin du combat, lorsque l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} inflige de nouveau un même effet de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs à une cible, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Repentir forcé{/g} n'augmente pas davantage le niveau de cet effet.

languages.text: До конца боя, когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} повторно накладывает на цель эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} того же типа, что уже на нее действует, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Принудительное покаяние{/g} больше не повышает уровень этого эффекта.
languages.original_text: Until the end of combat, whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g} reinflicts a {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effect of the same type already on a target, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Forced Repentance{/g} no longer increases the level of this effect.

traits.locale_text: До конца боя, когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} повторно накладывает на цель эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} того же типа, что уже на нее действует, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Принудительное покаяние{/g} больше не повышает уровень этого эффекта.

До конца боя, когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} повторно накладывает на цель эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} того же типа, что уже на нее действует, {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Принудительное покаяние{/g} больше не повышает уровень этого эффекта.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}, çatışma sonuna dek bir hedefte zaten bulunan aynı türde bir zamanla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren etkiye yeniden sebep olduğunda {g|f:4f04773685be45c29927c6740ccf64d8}Zoraki Tövbe{/g} artık bu etkinin seviyesini artırmaz. Etki, çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
